name: CSSDevices
body:
## 3 Steps to add a CSSDevice to your page. ### 1: Download and include the CSS file into your page: `` ### 2: Page the following code into where you want the device: ```
``` ### 3: Pick your device color and size and add the to the first divs' class: Devices: cd-5s-silver cd-5s-gold cd-5s-black cd-5c-blue cd-5c-green cd-5c-red cd-5c-yellow cd-5c-white Sizes: cd-lg (defaults to medium size) cd-sm cd-xs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
